alert.note: Alert for Lewis; Oswego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued December 01 at 3:36PM EST until December 01 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 2 inches in the most persistent lake snows. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph will result in areas of blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Oswego and Lewis counties. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Experimental content below...do not use operationally To view the experimental polygons please see: http://www.weather.gov/buf/lespolygon COORD...4360 7513 4380 7512 4374 7543 4382 7578 4367 7602 4346 7623 4336 7611 4348 7581 4345 7570 4342 7550 TIME Y22M12D01T0900Z-Y22M12D01T1200Z COORD...4360 7513 4376 7513 4387 7583 4372 7622 4357 7625 4343 7667 4325 7655 4320 7587 4348 7581 4342 7550 TIME Y22M12D01T1200Z-Y22M12D01T1800Z COORD...4356 7559 4366 7605 4365 7617 4355 7606 4343 7601 4338 7593 4341 7583 4348 7581 4342 7550 4350 7542 TIME Y22M12D01T1800Z-Y22M12D02T0000Z
info.instruction: Heavy snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
